examples: I can't believe I didn't know this

popularFormats.name: Listicle/Tips
popularFormats.description: Educational content structured as a list

popularFormats.name: Q&A / Engagement
popularFormats.description: Videos starting with a question to drive comments

popularFormats.name: Short & Snappy
popularFormats.description: Under 15s videos focusing on quick impact

insights: The most effective hook type is 'question', appearing in 40% of videos.
Users are mostly asked to 'follow' at the end.
Text overlays are dominant (80%), suggesting sound-off optimization is key.
Listicle format shows highest engagement potential.
recommendations: Start your video with a 'question' hook like: "Did you know this secret?"
Aim for a duration around 28 seconds to match current trends.
Use fast-paced editing with frequent cuts to maintain retention.
Always include text overlays for sound-off viewers.
End with a clear 'follow' CTA for maximum growth.
